NAME: The Dark Tunnel
STORY: You are in the Dark Tunnel, the remains of wild animals surround you. There are 500 stairs leading down to the cave entrance. Be cautious as you descend the stairs, avoid vampires, and watch for hidden treasures
NAVIGATION: PRESS 10 TO GO TO ROOM 10, PRESS 6 TO GO TO ROOM 6, PRESS 12 TO GO TO ROOM 12, press [60] to pick up coins, press [61] to meet a vampire, press [62] to pick up an item, or press [64] to purchase health, press save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game

NAME: The Cave Entrance
STORY: Welcome to the Cave Entrance. Beware of the venomous spider guarding the way forward! Crawl carefully and quietly to avoid losing your life from its bite
NAVIGATION: PRESS 11 TO GO TO ROOM 11, PRESS 14 TO GO TO ROOM 14, PRESS 15 TO GO TO ROOM 15, press [66] to pick up some coins, press [67] to pick up an artifact, press [68] to purchase health, press save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game: ")

NAME: The Python Scrubland

NAVIGATION: PRESS 17 TO GO TO ROOM 17, PRESS 9 TO GO TO ROOM 9, PRESS 13 TO GO TO ROOM 13, press [71] to pick up coins, press [70] to purchase health, press save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game:

NAME: The Enchanted Waterfall Chamber
STORY: You are in the Enchanted Waterfall Chamber. werewolves inhabit the woods, Stay out of the woods. Use your water bottle
NAVIGATION: PRESS 19 TO GO TO ROOM 19, PRESS 8 TO GO TO ROOM 8, PRESS 16 TO GO TO ROOM 16, press [75] to pick up coins, press [74] to use your water bottle to fetch drinking water, press [73] to wonder into the woods, press [72] to purchase life, press save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game:

NAME: The Hidden Chamber of Legends
STORY: Wow! Congratulations! You have reached the Hidden Chamber of Legends, solve the puzzle, recieve your legend badge and interact with an elder for more knowledge. its Time to write your name in the sands of time
NAVIGATION: PRESS 18 TO GO TO ROOM 18, PRESS 7 TO GO TO ROOM 7, PRESS 20 TO GO TO ROOM 20, press [74] to receive your legend badge (to gain coins from its blessing), press (94) to interact with an elder for more knowledge, also press (93) to solve a puzzle, press save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game.

NAME: Pammy Udo Bunch Dance
STORY: Have fun with Pammy Udo Bunch cultural Dance - Dance with Udo Bunch Cultural Team, Buyand drink Palm Wine for 10 coins. You can also Join the group in a live stage performance at Toscana de Villa, avoid vampires as this room has a gateway from room [1] they come looking for victims sometimes.
NAVIGATION: PRESS 10 TO GO TO ROOM 10, PRESS 1 TO GO TO ROOM 1, PRESS 12 TO GO TO ROOM 12, press 73 to Dance with Udo Bunch Cultural Team, [74] Buy and drink Palm Wine for 10 coins. You can also Join the group [press 75] in a live stage performance at Toscana de Villa, press save to save the your progress and exit to exit the game.

NAME: This is Ogburu Kingdom
STORY: Visit Oba Lake. You can choose to pay homeage to an Oba (to gain coins from its blessing)  and interact with an elder for more knowledge and also solve a puzzle
NAVIGATION: PRESS 18 TO GO TO ROOM 18, PRESS 5 TO GO TO ROOM 5, PRESS 20 TO GO TO ROOM 20, press [90] You can choose to pay homeage to an Oba (to gain coins from its blessing)  and press (91) to interact with an elder for more knowledge, press (92) to solve a puzzle, press save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game.

NAME: Gemini Skulls

NAVIGATION: PRESS 17 TO GO TO ROOM 17, PRESS 3 TO GO TO ROOM 3, PRESS 13 TO GO TO ROOM 13, press [71] to pick up coins, press [70] to purchase health, press [69] save to save your progress or press [exit] to exit the game:

NAME: Ewe Forest
STORY: Ewe Forest, Awka - Participate in the upcoming IMO AWKA festival, Ewe are dedicated to the gods in Awka so they can not be killed. Killing an EWE will result in a loss of all your coins for rites and 50% health, avoid vampires as this room has a gateway from room [1] they come looking for victims sometimes.
NAVIGATION: PRESS 1 TO GO TO ROOM 1, PRESS 6 TO GO TO ROOM 6, PRESS 12 TO GO TO ROOM 12,   press (101) to Participate in the upcoming IMO AWKA festival, Ewe are dedicated to the gods in Awka so they can not be killed. Killing an EWE will result in a loss of all your coins for rites and 50% health, press [78] to kill an Ewe, avoid vampires as this room has a gateway from room [1] they come looking for victims sometimes, [74] Buy and drink water from a local vendor for 5 coins, press save to save your progress and exit to exit the game.
